blossom.pvp.fail.both.attacker: Both you and %1$s have PVP disabled!
blossom.pvp.fail.both.defender: %1$s attacked you, but both of you have PVP disabled!
blossom.pvp.fail.attacker.defender: %1$s attacked you, but they have PVP disabled!
blossom.pvp.fail.defender.defender: %1$s attacked you, but you have PVP disabled!
